thread.title: Catherine

author: Catherine
title: Catherine
text: We'd heard of Trusted housesitters and decided we would give them a try for our recent month long trip. Having five cats to put in a cattery is expensive!! It was easy to register and view profiles. We corresponded with some very nice interesting people and we're very happy with who we chose. It allowed us to enjoy our holiday without worrying about things.
